thread.title: Trump to Stump for Tariffs in Steel Country

author: Joshua Jamerson
title: Trump to Stump for Tariffs in Steel Country

organizations.name: stump for tariffs in steel country

text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump is going to the Pittsburgh area this weekend to sell voters on two things: the administration’s plan to slap tariffs on foreign steel and aluminum, and a Republican candidate in a tight race for an open U.S. House seat.

The president, set to speak from an aircraft hangar near the Pittsburgh International Airport, is expected to link the two themes, saying he needs allies in Congress like Rick Saccone, the GOP candidate vying for Pennsylvania’s 18th district seat, to ensure his policies aren’t...
